personas.title: Baron
personas.name: Nicolaus Okerra
personas.appearance: This handsome bear of a man stands a head taller than the crowd
personas.background: and while starting to show his age with flecks of white in his black hair and beard
personas.biases: he retains a youthful smile and gentle eyes.
personas.strengths: A popular noble and hero of Meratt
personas.weakness: Baron Okerra is as equally renowned for his good looks as he is for his strict honor code.
personas.remain: and has a predilection for other lawful characters (+2).
personas.totalneed: Nicolaus is especially resistant to any discussions that suggest subterfuge or all-out revolution.
personas.death: Baron Okerra has always associated goodness with obedience and service
personas.deadorder: but he’s increasingly questioning the morality of his life since the Exaltation Massacre). Any expression of sympathy touches Nicolaus’s heart.

personas.title: Count
personas.name: Bartelby Lotheed
personas.appearance: Bartelby is tall
personas.background: thin
personas.biases: and handsome
personas.strengths: with thick hair and expressive eyes.
personas.weakness: The current steward of the Palace of Birdsong and the County of Meratt
personas.skills: Count Lotheed comes from a long line of talented arcanists.
personas.remain: Bartelby despises fools
personas.totalneed: and has no time for anyone without an Intelligence score of at least 12 or ranks in at least three different Knowledge skills (–2). He admires fellow practitioners of the arcane arts (+2).
personas.death: Bartelby has only contempt for the common peasant and feels they should know their place and remain quiet. Invoking any sense of compassion for the downtrodden or sense of collective identity with peasants raises his hackles.
personas.deadorder: Bartelby is greatly swayed by intellectual gifts. Anyone presenting him with an antique or spellbook worth at least 250 gp gains a +1 bonus on checks to influence him.

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Parthena Crabbe
personas.appearance: Parthena is a broad
personas.background: middle-aged woman with a wide smile and expressive eyes. She smells overwhelmingly of camphor and sugar.
personas.biases: The opinionated Dame Mistress Crabbe deals with her unresolved grief of her late husband’s passing by investing herself in everyone else’s lives. Her latest obsession is finding a suitor for her daughter Sepsinia.
personas.secretstrength: Parthena’s shallow judgment of others means appearances are what really matter; she’s predisposed toward anyone sporting at least 500 gp worth of jewelry (+2). While she has a thick skin regarding her own physique
personas.secretweak: she is extremely protective of her daughter and holds a grudge against anyone who insults the girl (–2).
personas.sucesses: Dame Crabbe is bored by anyone taking their noble responsibilities too seriously—one of the few reasons she hasn’t tried to pursue Baron Okerra for herself.
personas.remain: Anyone who seems romantically inclined toward Sepsinia—or better yet
personas.totalneed: attempts to woo her (+4)—will find Dame Crabbe very friendly. Parthena hasn’t noticed her own lack of love life and is easily flustered by anyone flirting with her. (+2)

personas.name: Sepsina Crabbe
personas.appearance: Sepsina is rail-thin and pale
personas.background: looking vaguely surprised or frightened by everything.
personas.biases: Dame Crabbe's daughter
personas.strengths: Sepsina fell into her current despondency after the suicide of her fiance'.
personas.secretweak: Sepsinia has a predisposition to avoid any conversation around her mother trying to arrange for a suitor for her (-2).
personas.sucesses: Any conversation about the hedge maze out back makes her extremely uncomfortable.
personas.remain: Any conversation about the hedge maze out back makes her extremely uncomfortable.

personas.title: Baroness Legate
personas.name: Adella Voinum
personas.appearance: A woman of legendary stature in her youth
personas.background: age has finally begun to bend the baroness
personas.biases: and she now stands merely 6 feet tall. She still proudly displays the scar left when an Andoren spear pierced her face years ago.
personas.strengths: A woman of wealth and discipline
personas.weakness: Baroness Voinum is a retired commander of the Taldan Phalanx. She is best known as the local grump—condescending
personas.skills: detached
personas.announce: and judgmental—but is also a font of knowledge regarding the region’s history.
personas.remain: Human
personas.totalneed: Baroness Voinum dislikes the wanton ways of youth and has a bias against any character younger than 25 years old unless they are lawful (–2). She has a soft spot for wine and is far more amicable when drinking (+2).

personas.title: Onora has a quiet hatred for Count Bartelby and is especially cold to anyone who tries to use his name or influence to persuade her.
personas.name: Baroness Voinum respects those with regard for tradition and an interest in history of the county and the nation.

personas.title: Honorary Tribune
personas.name: Onora Piscum
personas.appearance: Onora is plain
personas.background: muscular
personas.biases: and heavily freckled. A half-elf
personas.strengths: she looks far younger than her actual 55 years.
personas.weakness: A commoner both uncomfortable and unwelcome in the presence of high nobility
personas.skills: Onora fell into the job of tribune of Stachys after the death of the hereditary tribune
personas.death: Miss
personas.deadorder: Half-Elf

personas.name: Lucretzia Marthane
personas.appearance: Thin and pale - almost sickly - Lucretzia walks with a bit of a stagger
personas.background: Born to wealth and educated by the best tutors
personas.biases: Lucretzia is a noble and some important nobles cousin
personas.strengths: though she never goes into details.
personas.secretweak: The Lucretzia hates nobles and those who serve them (–2)
personas.sucesses: but she has an immediate affection for anyone working to root out corruption and abuse (+2).
personas.remain: Lucretzia hates anyone implying she doesn’t understand what she’s doing or the needs of others—whether she does or not.
personas.totalneed: Lucreztia has a solid appreciation for Galtan history and writing
personas.death: and couching new ideas in relation to revolutionary writers is sure to make an impression.

personas.title: Marquess
personas.name: Tanasha Starborne
personas.appearance: A gnome with beautifully styled rainbow hair and a glowing smile
personas.background: Tanasha dresses in the rich greens of the Verduran Forest with a stylized broach denoting the city of Wispil at her shoulder.
personas.biases: An avid supporter of gnome rights and a prior vocal supporter of Princess Eutropia
personas.strengths: she's taken advantage of the current confusion to make her own claim for the Priomogen crown
personas.weakness: hoping to leverage Wispil's relative isolation
personas.skills: strategic value
personas.announce: and military might during the War for the Crown.
personas.remain: Gnome
personas.totalneed: Tanasha despises anyone who mistreats servants
personas.death: or small folk (–2)
personas.deadorder: but sheadores anyone who treats sevants as equals or comes from a short-raced background (+2).

personas.title: Count
personas.name: Orlundo Zespire
personas.appearance: Orlundo wears traditional Taldan outfits that seem a bit over starched. His graying
personas.background: short hair is smoothed back from his tired face. Worn around the edges
personas.biases: Zespire keeps his smiles subdued and almost flat.
personas.strengths: The “Iron Gar” made a name for himself hunting pirates for the Grand Prince
personas.weakness: granted a vacant senate seat for a successful pirate hunt that lead into River Kingdoms.
personas.sucesses: Count Zespire despises pirates and anyone who seems like a thief or a supporter of such (–4)
personas.remain: but has an appreciation for people with ranks in appraise (+2).
personas.totalneed: Orlundo knows trade and knows when a deal is good or bad. Attempts to lie to or cheat him encourage icnreased scrutiny.
personas.death: With both a love for trade and a deep understanding of Tandak's complicated canal systems
personas.deadorder: talk about restoring the Stachys Spur gains his attention

personas.title: Baron
personas.name: Remaio Alcasti
personas.appearance: Cropped
personas.background: curly hair
personas.biases: plucked eyebrows
personas.strengths: manacured beard and nails
personas.weakness: Remaio looks every bit like a man born into Nobility.
personas.skills: A descendent of the Countess Remaio Alcasti
personas.announce: his family once ruled the county of Merat before the titles were stripped away. Their direct lands are now the Telus Barony
personas.secretbias: Remaio seeks to reclaim his familial lands.
personas.totalneed: His Lordship
personas.death: Human
personas.deadorder: Remaio can't stand the rigidness of lawful types (–2)

personas.title: Tribune
personas.name: Aric of Northern Tandak
personas.appearance: An ever-smiling man with short
personas.background: wavy hair shot with gray
personas.biases: a tightness around his eyes as he continually scans the crowd. His clothes speak of the latest fashions
personas.strengths: but seem to be slightly sized for larger man keeping an air of quick movement around him.
personas.weakness: An attending tribune judge from the Northern Tandak
personas.skills: Aric is found at the edges of the crowd holding his own with his wit and charm though he seems like he’s looking for something else while working the room.
personas.remain: Tribune Aric is highly opinionated and can't stand people who take the spotlight from him or ignore him (–2)
personas.totalneed: but anyone with several knowledge skills or faining interest in his opinions find him to be quite talkative (+2).
personas.death: Well versed in double-speak
personas.deadorder: it is hard to win his favor from a platform you don't actually support.

personas.title: Countess
personas.name: Abrielle Pace
personas.appearance: Only ridiculously gauche noble clothing and fine jewelry set Countess Pace apart from any other Taldan. Her face is usually in a smile
personas.background: though it quickly turns to a sneer when she loses control of the conversation. She has short but well-kept brown hair locked back in a stylized bun.
personas.biases: A countess and member of the senate from a county along the western borders of Taldor
personas.strengths: Abrielle Pace seeks to advance by any means available.
personas.remain: She has an ovious willingness to quickly shift her political stance depending on whom she's speaking with.

personas.title: Duke
personas.name: Leonard Centimus
personas.appearance: With a round face and a few extra pounds
personas.background: Leonard looks very different from the waifish ladies’ man he was 5 years ago. He takes great pride in tinkering with his wheelchair
personas.biases: revising its design and paying artisans to embellish it.
personas.strengths: An attending duke of Grand Duchess Cisera Tiberan of Tandak prefecture
personas.weakness: Leonard Centimus is an intellectual and tinkerer whose head for systems makes him a good administrator
personas.skills: if a little awkward with people.
personas.death: Leonard sees his paraplegia as another challenge to tinker with; he appreciates it when others notice to adjustments and personal improvements he’s made to his chair
personas.deadorder: and enjoys discussing ideas for future revisions. He appreciates others who try to see things from his perspective. While he welcomes people who take his unique situation into consideration

personas.name: Gloriana Morilla
personas.appearance: Lady Morilla stands tall among her noble peers
personas.background: sporting the finest of Absalom’s fashion. Her attire is far less ostentatious than that of other present nobles
personas.biases: but she makes up for it with a grace of movement that allows her to easily shift between crowds.
personas.strengths: Leader of an international secret society known as the Sovereign Court
personas.weakness: Lady Morilla is one of Princess Eutropia’s staunchest allies
personas.skills: and a believer that members of Avistan’s aristocracy must be held to their end of the social contract with those they rule.
personas.death: Lady Morilla finds nobles with interest in more common

personas.title: High Strategos
personas.name: Maxillar Pythareus
personas.appearance: Maxillar is a muscular man in his early forties. Years under the elements have weathered his skin
personas.background: and he keeps his silver hair closely cropped. He wears a green-and blue tabard emblazoned with Taldor’s official coat of arms
personas.biases: publicly declaring his loyalty to the nation more than anything else.
personas.strengths: Nearly every Taldan recognizes commander-in-chief Maxillar Pythareus as Grand Prince Stavian III’s right hand and a fanatical supporter of the throne. He believes in political might and economic stability through military supremacy
personas.weakness: advocating for new wars of conquest against wayward colonies like Andoran and Cheliax
personas.skills: or even Qadira.
personas.death: The High Strategos is practical. As a honed equestrian
personas.deadorder: he lowers his social guard for any talks that involve animal development or riding tricks. He also shares a similar love of the hiking

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Kalbio of Breezy Creek
personas.appearance: Kalbio uncomfortably wears clothing of noble finery
personas.background: constantly fidgeting with the cuffs or scratching at his neck. His calloused hands
personas.biases: simple hair style
personas.strengths: and sun-beaten face all set him apart
personas.weakness: as does his broad
personas.skills: genuine smile.
personas.announce: Kalbio is from the small hamlet of Breezy Creek
personas.race: and he is the intended recipient of the noble elevation from Grand Prince Stavian. His parents scrounged copper pieces to pay for his education as a weaver’s apprentice
personas.secretbias: and he showed remarkable skill. His story inspired several local nobles to begin clamoring over his tapestries
personas.secretstrength: and for nearly a decade the savant’s work has decorated even the imperial palace.
personas.death: Sir
personas.deadorder: Human

personas.title: Princess
personas.name: Eutropia Stavian I
personas.appearance: Slim and athletic
personas.background: Princess Eutropia bears the distinctive cheekbones and nose of her Stavian father and grandmother. Despite the ostentatious jewelry she wears
personas.biases: her gown and hair are more conservative than that of most of the gala’s attendees.
personas.strengths: The Princess Eutropia is trying to become heir apparent for the Primogen Crown and campaigns for increased rights along with the shaking off of the shackles of some of Taldors traditions.
personas.remain: If Eutropia has one true weakness
personas.totalneed: it is her love of animals
personas.death: especially her trusted canine
personas.deadorder: Taldogis.

personas.name: Wyssilika the Fantabulous
personas.appearance: Wyssilka is a halfling wearing standout black-red and- white attire. She wears similar makeup
personas.background: embellishing her childish face to resemble a raccoon. Despite her color choice
personas.biases: Wyssilka is abound with enthusiasm and smiles
personas.strengths: showing off a set of immaculate white teeth.
personas.weakness: Wyssilka is a childrens entertainer
personas.skills: the jovial halfling works to amuse noble children
personas.announce: whom she has discovered tend to overhear far more secrets than their parents realize.
personas.remain: Halfling
personas.deadorder: It is possible for a PC to spot one of Wyssilka’s minor displays of magical aptitude. Succeeding any of the listed checks uncovers Wyssilka’s use of divine magic

personas.title: Grand Duke
personas.name: Avernathus
personas.appearance: A balding man well in his sixties with a weathered face and wispy white hair falls roughly around his face in a hollow crown of hair.
personas.background: A senator from a seat tied to Porthmos Gap
personas.biases: while disinterested in typical politics Avernathus is looking to pass along his knowledge to future generations.
personas.sucesses: Avernathus is proud of his prowess in magical and martial fields
personas.remain: but the magus is fearful that his information will be overshadowed in the senate by his lack of actual power
personas.totalneed: which his disinterest in kept him from perceived corruption but has kept the best acolytes away from his mentorship. Avernathus fears his distance from the pulse of the senate will keep families from sending him their best pupils.

personas.title: Baronet
personas.name: Duranis Cicato
personas.appearance: With short-cropped red hair
personas.background: he stands rigidly with a facial scar that turns his dour expression into a slight smirk.
personas.biases: A strong proponent strengthening Taldor’s military
personas.strengths: Baronet Cicato took the senate seat once held by his mother. Forward looking
personas.weakness: Duranis is seeking to better his nation by removing roadblocks to improvements—including the dated ideals of Old Taldan primogeniture.
personas.totalneed: Baronet Cicato can be caught up in his grand plans for revitalizing the military and keeping an eye of softening positions that other nobles make containing compromises
personas.death: he may lose sight that his position can be eroded by too much sentimentality. He can be seen too weak by other nobles for his allowances for military improvements also come at the cost of keeping traditions going.

personas.name: Zariyah Clement
personas.appearance: Lady Zariyah Clement dresses in glowing golden dresses with delicately styled hair that is on the edge of the latest Taldan fashion. Of noble bearing
personas.background: she keeps poised even when confronted by the least magnanimous amongst Taldor’s senate.
personas.biases: Lady Zariyah Clement’s family has roots that tie it to the Sixth Army of Exploration’s expedition in the Mwangi Expanse. She is focused on keeping her family in power even while helping effect change in Taldor’s political arena.
personas.sucesses: Lady Clement is deeply concerned about her family’s position in Taldor. Despite coming into the senate on the family’s growing merits
personas.remain: this fear is never far from her mind. While some just see her meticulous mien
personas.totalneed: she can be focused on hearing about her family’s status. In the current political climate
personas.death: she tries to use what she gleans so she can react to her efforts to assist the claim that Princess Eutropia is making for the Lion Throne while keeping her family’s position intact.

personas.title: Marquess
personas.name: Charlotte Deschamps
personas.appearance: Always in darker shades of clothing
personas.background: Marquess Charlotte Deschamps wears exquisite dresses and silvered jewelry. Flowing black hair hangs loosely around her expressive face. She can be seen with a laugh or smile just at the edge of her lips. She can also be seen with her shadowy associate ever at her side
personas.biases: with several blades hidden about her person.
personas.strengths: Charlotte Deschamps has raised herself from the commoners of Oppara
personas.weakness: making her way (through adventure and other means) to the senate seat of House Cato
personas.skills: which she has recently vacated to assist Princess Eutropia in her endeavor for the throne.
personas.death: Marquess Charlotte Deschamps detests trite conversations and ungracious requests; she is finding the Exaltation Gala extremely dull. Characters can see that the event is taxing Deschamps more expressive personality
personas.deadorder: allowing them better ways to influence her during the Gala.

personas.title: Landgrave
personas.name: Ogvai Jarlbjorn
personas.appearance: This Ulfen man has stringy blonde hair streaming down in a torrent of waves and wild strands. His eyes are ever watchful and he quickly faces newcomers to his conversation. He seems to be in constant motion
personas.background: even if he’s standing still.
personas.biases: Having earned his title for a diligent warning on a rain-soaked evening
personas.strengths: Ogvai quickly became known for his effectiveness and practicality. He was raised to an empty senate seat to become entrenched in political conflicts far from his Fog Peaks territory.
personas.remain: Landgrave Jarlbjorn detests anything that has a feeling of “witch magic” to it
personas.totalneed: keeping his childhood superstitions withheld from those around him but it can be a “weakness” that others might exploit.

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Remilliard Kastner
personas.appearance: In the gold-and-crimson plate of Ragathiel
personas.background: Remilliard stands self-assuredly
personas.biases: his golden hair tied back from his clean-shaven face. Alert blue eyes glance towards any he thinks as trouble and they spark in fury at the idea of peace with modern Cheliax.
personas.strengths: Descendant of the Kastner family that remained in Taldor
personas.weakness: Remilliard has taken his family’s senate seat and uses his position to fight for progressive change within Taldor.
personas.totalneed: Remilliard can be a bit too focused on his need for vengeance against the slights his family name has endured since the separation of Cheliax from Taldor. He can be goaded into lengthy diatribes against any move towards a peaceful future with Cheliax that may allow some to circumvent his own progressive plans.

personas.title: Viscountess
personas.name: Octavia Nicodemius
personas.appearance: A wizened woman in dark noble clothing
personas.background: Octavia Nicodemius’s eyes have a hint of cataracts. Her white hair is unkempt
personas.biases: and her bearing is one that long ago left worrying about what others feel as appropriate to the younger nobles.
personas.strengths: One of the longest serving senators
personas.weakness: Octavia Nicodemius is more focused on her own concerns than that of the war for the crown. She may be moved to favor the Princess Eutropia
personas.skills: but currently she favors the stability offered in maintaining the status quo.
personas.death: Octavia Nicodemius is not one for the distractions of the Exaltation Gala or senate life
personas.deadorder: she’s focused on completing a compilation of her archiving of the Endless Repository. She can be seen testing potential replacements to her seat and stewardship of the Repository as the Gala allows her access to a lot of talented people that may impress her enough to seek more from them.

personas.title: Duke
personas.name: Georgi Blackus Talbot II
personas.appearance: A bald man in his fifties
personas.background: Duke Georgi Backus Talbot II has pinched face and discerning eyes as if weighing the value of the people he speaks with. He dresses in dark blue Taldan fashions
personas.biases: with an emerald diadem on a golden circlet on his head and has a graying moustache.
personas.strengths: Duke Georgi Backus Talbot II is a political figure cut of two cloths: one a trade magnate
personas.weakness: the other a senator in the Taldan empire.
personas.totalneed: Talbot’s distrust of close connections may make it harder for those seeking to get into his good graces. The betrayal of his son’s to the faith of Abadar still stings
personas.death: which makes those words appealing to his family or boasts of adventuring fall on deaf ears.

personas.title: Earl
personas.name: Gahez Varima
personas.appearance: A tall man
personas.background: Gahez keeps a weary smile on his face while dealing with some of his colleagues in the senate. His long black hair falls loosely straight pat his shoulders. His outfits seem to be well-traveled
personas.biases: as if they’ve been moved around form place to place recently.
personas.strengths: The senate representative from northeast of Zimar
personas.weakness: Earl Gahez Varima traces his lineage back to the first Vudrani immigrants to Taldor.
personas.totalneed: The peacemaking with Qadira and making reports to the Grand Prince have been taking their toll on Gahez’s resolve. Each senate decision regarding Qadira sends Varima in a flurry of diplomatic activity. Those looking to pressure Earl Varima may be spreading inflammatory rumors that cause his anxiety to rise.

personas.title: Earl
personas.name: Calhadion Vernisant
personas.appearance: Earl Calhadion Verisant keeps his hair slicked back from his face
personas.background: looking as though he’s recently took off his helmet. Whether found in noble finery or finest armor
personas.biases: Vernisant prowls his social circles with an arrogance stemming from his battle-tested might.
personas.strengths: The leader of Greater Ridonport
personas.weakness: Verinant feels it’s time for him to step into the power vacuum that Grand Prince Stavian III created when dismissing several officials. He’s trying to use his time at the Exaltation Gala to make his bid to become a close advisor to the grand prince as only a direct descendant of General Arnisant could.
personas.totalneed: Earl Calhadion Vernisant’s bloodline is very important to his political career and goals
personas.death: giving him motivation to underscore its value with propaganda or other flattering documentation. This leaves Vernisant open to attacks should some question his heritage and lineage
personas.deadorder: to which the earl may reply to challenges with a fury.

personas.title: Senator
personas.name: Gengethlia
personas.appearance: Old by even dwarven standards
personas.background: Senator Gengethlia attends the senate in his most formal and ancient of cloting - which happens to be his old wrestling atire. Grey and balding
personas.biases: with teeth have long since been lost to the stone
personas.strengths: he smiles and scowls in equal mesure.
personas.weakness: One of Taldor's more unusual senators
personas.skills: Gengethlia is an old former wrestler who was appointed to the Senate by Stavian I because of his popularity. He's made no secret that he's been recruiting a private militia for
personas.death: As one of only a handful of dwarven Senators
personas.deadorder: Gengethlia has a weakness for his own people and their stories. Anyone with the knowledge of dwarven kind can pick easily pick up the notes of oral traditions in his speech

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Karina Deckland
personas.appearance: Katrina's most striking feature is easily her singular red eye
personas.background: rumored by many as a sign of a pact with infernal powers. With long
personas.biases: wispy black hair and a tendency to lock eyes for just a little too long
personas.strengths: she seems to thrive on unnerving those around her.
personas.weakness: A guest of Earl Calhadion Vernisant and the now-eldest daughter of a small family of Chelish Nobles
personas.skills: Karina rose to prominance after her half-sisters murder by Pathfinder agents several years ago. She mkes no secret of her distaste for the society or other
personas.death: Her hatred of the Pathfinder Society is apparent and easy to play on. If someone expreses a similar distast for the society
personas.deadorder: adventurers

personas.name: Dominicus Rell
personas.appearance: Lord Dominicus Rell is an imposing man of Azlanti ancestry
personas.background: and the cold stare of his multi-colored eyes has been known to freeze people in their tracks. Lean but strong
personas.biases: he keeps his movements precise and deliberate.
personas.strengths: A close advisor of the Grand Prince of Taldor
personas.weakness: Dominicus Rell is also the head of the Lion Blade's hidden Shadow Schools
personas.skills: and the only man alive who knows all of their locations. While technically palace staff
personas.announce: Dominicus Rell is one of the few outside of the Grand Prince's personal attache and family who lives at the Imperial Palace.
personas.remain: Human

personas.title: Father
personas.name: Basri
personas.appearance: Incredibly old and with a broken spirit Father Basri shambles to and fro
personas.background: reminding the Taldor traditionalists of their old deific patron
personas.biases: the Last Azlanti. The sadness of his patron’s death and the years since have weighed heavily on his shoulders
personas.strengths: and he walks with a stooped back
personas.weakness: leaning heavily on a cane.
personas.skills: Father Basri maintains the Basilica of the Last Man as a tourist attraction
personas.announce: keeping Aroden at least somewhat alive and remembered. As an Archbishop
personas.race: Father Basri has a permanent invitation to state celebrations
personas.secretbias: and uses the opportunity to raise donations for his dwindling church.
personas.totalneed: Father
personas.death: Elf

personas.title: Captain
personas.name: Seferi
personas.appearance: Dressed in her corsair blacks
personas.background: Captain Sefari sticks out like a sore thumb (and the 12 inch peacock feather in her hat doesn't help matters). Scowling
personas.biases: she moves about anxiously
personas.strengths: and the faint smell of rum wafts about her.
personas.weakness: A Zimar Corsair
personas.skills: little is known about Captain Sefari for certain
personas.announce: though a few like to tell fanciful stories.
personas.remain: Human
personas.deadorder: Despite her seemingly rough demeanor

personas.title: Baronet
personas.name: Solmon Menander
personas.appearance: Well dressed in a worn three piece suit
personas.background: Solomon Meanders indulgience in pipe tobacco has left his breath and clothes stained with its smell. Over-the-hill
personas.biases: the frown lines creasing his face and forehead make him look far older than his still colored hair suggests.
personas.strengths: An unquestionably corrupt bureaucrat
personas.weakness: this bitter noble controls a well known back channel to move things through the Taldan legislature. Some wisper he's uncovered scandelous evidence regarding the princess
personas.skills: and has been sitting on it until just before the vote
personas.announce: where he has a presentation scheduled.
personas.remain: Human
personas.deadorder: It's practically a well-known fact at this point that Judge Solomon wants to make the nobility as uncomfortable as possible. Complaining about the nobility is a sure way to earn his attention

personas.title: Viscount
personas.name: Theon Cenabri
personas.appearance: Dressed in mutted colors and lacking ostentatious jewelry
personas.background: Viscount Theon Cenabri stands out in this particular crowd as the only noble not wearing flashy jewels. He might be mistaken for a servant were in not for his expensive and well-recognized signet ring and frequent apearance at state events.
personas.biases: A distant descendant of Italice Cenabri
personas.strengths: who was murdered by Honaria Alcasti's Lieutenant
personas.weakness: this particular viscount is remarkable in that while he has done little more than coast on his family name
personas.skills: he has done nothing scandelous to harm his family name
personas.announce: and he treats his servants better than most. Invested in protecting his family's name
personas.race: he has a quiet but deep hatred for Remaio Alcasti.
personas.remain: His Lordship
personas.totalneed: Human

personas.name: Titus Lotheed-Casava
personas.appearance: Young and proud
personas.background: Titus' ornate dueling sword accents his green tunic proudly. The smell of his cologn is overpowering
personas.biases: but while it covers his breath
personas.strengths: his glassy
personas.weakness: drooping eyes and irregular speech make it obvious he's been drinking.
personas.skills: A distant cousin of Martella's by marriage
personas.announce: Titus is a poiled bully with an intimidating reputation as an accomplished duelist. Oppara's given him everything he's wanted out of life
personas.race: and hes not yet faced any real threats to his lifestyle.
personas.remain: Lord
personas.totalneed: Human

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Malphene Trant
personas.appearance: Dressed in tight fitting dresses
personas.background: Dame Trants muscles keep her from seeming provocative.
personas.biases: The daughter of an influencial Senator
personas.strengths: Maphane Trant is a daddy's girl at heart and supports him as best she can.

personas.name: Imistos Gulben
personas.appearance: Moving defferentially
personas.background: this servant and shoe-shiner does his best to avoid being underfoot.
personas.biases: One of the many servants in attendance at the Exaltation Gala.
personas.deadorder: Died shortly after being forced to ingest his own poison by Rodrigo Hernandez after attempting to murder the party while they slept in the panic room beneath the senate.

personas.title: Grand Prince
personas.name: Stavian III
personas.appearance: Dressed perfectly in regal attire
personas.background: his clothes don't show even a hint of wear. He smiles often and slightly too widely.
personas.biases: The ruler of Taldor.
personas.deadorder: Fatally stabbed by a Lion's Blade during the Exaltation Massacre

personas.name: Kathann Zalar
personas.appearance: A lions blade
personas.background: Zalar rarely goes anywhere without wearing her uniform (and its accompanied rapier).
personas.biases: Lion Blade Agent

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Aayef Ghazali
personas.appearance: Still a young boy
personas.background: Aayef has the deep tans of the Kelishites.
personas.biases: Saved by the party
personas.strengths: Aayef has become an agent of Gloriana Morilla's Sovereign Court.

personas.name: The Night Swan
personas.appearance: Descriptions vary wildly between
personas.background: While many claim the Night Swan is an ancient and mythical fey
personas.biases: others claim it is a simple bandit. Either way
personas.strengths: attacks are recent and relatively frequent.

personas.name: Cateline Lotheed
personas.appearance: Always in darker shades of clothing
personas.background: Lady Cateline wears exquisite dresses and silvered jewelry. Flowing blond hair hangs loosely around her expressive face
personas.biases: and she is rarely seen without a book written in either magical or arcaic script.
personas.strengths: Bartelby's Sister
personas.weakness: Cateline is perhaps Martella's friendliest living relative in that she's never been hostile but has instead kept their relationship icy
personas.skills: despite being best friends in their childhood. Cateline's studies in the arcane
personas.race: and utter lack of responsibilities makes her semi-nomadic.
personas.remain: Lady
personas.totalneed: Human

personas.title: Knight
personas.name: Gul Gusairne
personas.appearance: Dressed immaculately
personas.background: Sir Gul Gusairne keeps careful care of his clothing
personas.biases: though it shows signs of heavy use and his boots and coat tails are often coated in mud from the day.
personas.strengths: The seneshal of the Palace of Birdsong
personas.weakness: Sir Gul Gusairne is responsible for the security of the Palace
personas.skills: and by extension
personas.remain: Half-Elf

personas.name: Yarelle Towsine
personas.appearance: Dressed in farmer clothing
personas.background: she doesn't look like the young noble born some sixty years ago.
personas.biases: A distant cousin of Adella Voinum
personas.strengths: she ran off to study magic before dropping off the map. Now she administers a small hamlet on the outskirts of the Voinum Barony.

personas.name: Jeke
personas.appearance: A fisherman living in an old beaver dam
personas.background: Jeke smells cleaner than you'd expect
personas.biases: but his body odor is still strong.
personas.strengths: An old man tired of city life
personas.weakness: Jeke calls himself

personas.name: Rena Winterall
personas.appearance: Dressed in woodland greens
personas.background: Rena is desribed as an agile woman rarely seen without her knives.
personas.biases: The daughter of a local homesteader who lost his lands under the Lotheeds' taxes
personas.strengths: Rena leads a group of outlaws hiding within and raiding from the Lionsmane Forest.

personas.name: Felsha
personas.appearance: Dressed in ratty
personas.background: third-hand clothing
personas.biases: Felsha is often seen in the streets of towns begging for help.
personas.strengths: An advocate for New Towne
personas.weakness: Felsha became interesting when she was attacked by assailants on the road only to be saved by someone she now calls

personas.title: Archbanker
personas.name: Paril
personas.appearance: Dressed in immaculate priestess robes
personas.background: the Archbanker always smells like a different perfume each day.
personas.biases: The Archbanker of the Grand Bank of Abadar in Lotheedar
personas.strengths: Paril is perhaps the most important and useful non-noble in Meratt.

personas.title: Duke
personas.name: Panivar Lotheed VI
personas.appearance: Too few have seen Duke Panivar in recent years to get an accurate description.
personas.background: Lady Martella's Uncle
personas.biases: Duke Panivar is a renowned archmage and is not to be triffled with. Avoid at all costs.
